main event: A military report from Project Blue Book documents a sighting of a brilliant white flash over Honshu, Japan on January 5, 1956.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1 hour and 56 minutes.,Military aircraft were scrambled to investigate the sighting.,No explosive sound was reported during the sighting.,The Japanese police were advised of similar observations in the area.,The source of the report included both military and civilian observers.
sighted object: One unidentified object emitting brilliant white flashes
witness description: Military and civilian observers reported the sighting
